description: {"blocks":[{"key":"aifv3","text":"This collection of protocols describes different behavioural assays performed in mice including, grip strength test, pole test, rotarod, open field and nose poking learning task.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fqfj3","text":"A grip strength apparatus (BioSeb instruments, BIO-GS3, France) was used to evaluate paw force of 10-12-week-old male or female mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3fjj3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56hn1","text":"Procedure:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2a3j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8cin4","text":"Habituate the mouse in the testing room for at least  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"840mt","text":"Hold the mouse firmly by the tail and slowly lower it on the grid of the grip strength apparatus until the forepaws grasp the middle of the grid. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f7o2t","text":"Lower the mouse to a horizontal position and slowly pull following the axis of the sensor until the mouse releases its grasp on the grid. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hgj5","text":"Repeat the test 3 times with 30 min resting period between each trial. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q7uf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fod4s","text":"Repeat the test for   (1/3). ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c5oro","text":"Repeat the test for   (2/3). ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a3r4t","text":"Repeat the test for   (3/3).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9gg60","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"7640F1D7508711EF9C050A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"783F2349508711EF99200A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2ohou","text":"Once testing is completed, place the mouse back into its home cage and clean the apparatus before testing the next mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vlh","text":"The test was conducted with a homemade 48 cm metal rod of 1 cm diameter covered with adhesive tape to facilitate traction. Male or female mice of 10-12-weeks of age were used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ltrg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tr4d","text":"Procedure:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bo656","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f8f6l","text":"Habituate the moude in the testing room for at least  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"771hk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bq5sv","text":"Hold the mouse on the surface of your hand and bring it up to the top of the pole.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ihau","text":"Position the mouse head-up at the top of the pole.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgfsb","text":"Record the time required to turn (t-turn) and to climb down completely. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4hq7f","text":"Once testing is completed, place the mouse back into its home cage and clean the metal rod before testing the next mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bu50a","text":"Motor coordination was evaluated with a rotarod apparatus (Harvard Apparatus, LE8205, USA) on 10-12-week-old male or female mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ec6ac","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k9d3","text":"Mice were pre-trained on the rotarod for two consecutive days to reach a stable performance and then tested on the third day.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3367f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c50rf","text":"Procedure:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kp23","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1g942","text":"The locomotor behavior of 11-12-week-old male or female mice was recorded using an infrared actimeter (Superflex sensor version 4.6, Omnitech) using the Fusion software (v5.6 Superflex Edition, RRID:SCR_017972). A chamber partition was used to test two mice at the same time. {"blocks":[{"key":"5ol73","text":"After  , pause the recording and administer drugs or saline. In the present study, this was one of the following substances:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":6,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2mt9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmbli","text":"0.9% sodium chloride saline solution (Halyard, #cat 116)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30ur9","text":"Cocaine hydrochloride 20 mg/kg (Medisca, cat# 53-21-4, Canada)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42ajl","text":"D-amphetamine sulfate at 5 mg/kg (Tocris, 2813, UK)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bimj3","text":"SCH23390-HCl 50 µg/kg (Sigma, D-054, Canada)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"612af","text":"Quinpirole-HCl 0.2 mg/kg (Sigma, Q-102, Canada)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gh7i","text":"Raclopride L-tartrate 1 mg/kg (Sigma, R-121, Canada)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1200,"guid":"E62223A2509211EF9C050A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cat85","text":"Immediately place the mouse back into the chamber and record locomotion for another  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":2400,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34ir9","text":"Once testing is completed, place the mouse back into its home cage and clean the open field boxes before testing the next mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ieg8","text":"Appetitively motivated operant learning was assessed using the open source Feeding Experimentation Device 3 (FED3) (https://doi.org/10.7554/eLife.66173). Individually housed animals were evaluated in a 12h/12h light/dark cycle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":116,"length":37}],"data":{}},{"key":"9jciv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"994o8","text":"Procedure:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ag2f1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"47C03C77509311EF99200A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.7554/eLife.66173)."}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9dtmr","text":"Place the feeding devices in the home cages under a free feeding paradigm (automatically dispenses a new pellet each time the mouse collects the pellet in the well) for 2 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3n03k","text":"After 2 days, change the device mode to a fixed ratio (FR1) paradigm (the mouse learns to nose poke on the active port to receive a single pellet).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"15ifr","text":"Record nose-poking rate and poke efficiency for 3 consecutive days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"baqqi","text":"After 3 days, change the device mode to a repeating progressive ratio schedule (nose-poking requirement begins at FR1 and increases by 1 poke each time a pellet is earned)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93jp4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28uq2","text":"o When mice fail to poke on either active or inactive port for  , the ratio is automatically reset to FR1. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":63,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":1800,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
